params.about_text: I am a creative and strategic web developer with experience in branding, UX design, development, and project management.I specialize in clean code that is both secure and accessible.Passionate web developer with a wide range of skills in the world of Node.js, Angular and React. I'm also a creative mind and enjoy designing websites while I'm not coding away.We're a small startup in San Francisco looking for a Web developer. If you're a skilled and motivated self-starter who loves to take on the challenges of developing user-friendly, scalable web applications, we want you to join our team!
